list_definition.definition: (often abbreviated to phone) foun an instrument for speaking to someone from a distance, using either an electric current which passes along a wire or radio waves

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He spoke to me by telephone / on the telephone

list_definition.definition: to (try to) speak to (someone) by means of the telephone
to send (a message) or ask for (something) by means of the telephone
to reach or make contact with (another place) by means of the telephone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What’s the code if you want to telephone England from Australia?
